thread.title: Liverpool legend Steven Gerrard to attend FA Cup replay against Plymouth
thread.title_full: Liverpool legend Steven Gerrard to attend FA Cup replay against Plymouth

author: Jacob Murtagh
title: Liverpool legend Steven Gerrard to attend FA Cup replay against Plymouth
text:
Sport Liverpool legend Steven Gerrard to attend FA Cup replay against Plymouth Gerrard is making the 600-mile round trip to Home Park as Jurgen Klopp's side bid to secure a place in the fourth round Share Steven Gerrard will be in the crowd at Home Park (Photo: BT Sport) Share   Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Steven Gerrard will be in the crowd for Liverpool's FA Cup replay against Plymouth. 
The Reds legend is making the 600-mile round trip from Merseyside to Home Park as Jurgen Klopp's side bid to secure a place in the fourth round. 
League Two Plymouth held Liverpool to a goalless at Anfield last week to secure a replay on their own patch. 
Gerrard will be hoping his former club can go one better as they bid to avoid a massive upset against the high-flying Pilgrims. https://www.instagram.com/p/BPZr09mDGo-/embed 
Meanwhile, Klopp has dismissed the critics accusing him of disrespect towards the FA Cup â€” and will again rest his star names. 
The Liverpool manager is taking another youthful team to Plymouth for a third-round replay necessary after a shadow side that was the Reds' youngest EVER drew the original tie with the League Two club a fortnight ago. 
That day, the German coach was roundly attacked for resting his entire title-chasing first team. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
